alert.note: Alert for Benton; Decatur (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 2:42PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Benton and northeastern Decatur Counties through 315 PM CDT... At 241 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of New Johnsonville, or 15 miles south of Camden, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... I-40 Near The Tennessee River and Sugar Tree. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
